translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The forward and reverse order of conditions, the Tipitaka commentary on the Paṭṭhāna,🔽The section on wholesome, limited-objects

original: 17.12. Kusalattika, Parittārammaṇattika🔽Kusalaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusala attika paritta ārammaṇa attika  kusalam paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati
translated: A wholesome, limited-object condition …🔽… is related to a unwholesome, unlimited-object condition as a cause condition. (Abbreviated.) (Nine times.) … as a support condition … as a presence condition … as a non-disappearance condition …

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…🔽vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
translated: … as a result condition … as a dissociation condition … as a absence condition … as a disappearance condition … as a presence-absence condition … as a non-disappearance-absence condition …🔽A wholesome, exalted-objects condition …🔽… is related to a unwholesome, exalted-objects condition as a cause condition. (Abbreviated.) (Nine times.) … as a support condition … as a presence condition … as a non-disappearance condition …

original: Kusalaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kusalam mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: … as a result condition … as a dissociation condition … as an absence condition … as a disappearance condition … as a presence-absence condition … as a non-disappearance-absence condition …🔽A wholesome, immeasurable-objects condition …🔽… is related to a unwholesome, immeasurable-objects condition as a cause condition. (Abbreviated.) (Six times.) … as a support condition … as a presence condition … as a non-disappearance condition …

original: Kusalaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusalam appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
translated: … as a result condition … as a dissociation condition … as an absence condition … as a disappearance condition … as a presence-absence condition … as a non-disappearance-absence condition …
